section.p: Contains the response to an assessment question requiring a textual answer.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type String
The response to an assessment question requiring a textual answer.

Contains exactly one [1..1] assessmentQuestion with data type Code
Code indicating the question asked as part of the assessment tool performed.
Contains zero or one [0..1] responseScore with data type Real

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type String
The response to an assessment question requiring a textual answer.
